name: S - S - Ventilation - Corridors Ventilation
Pre-start checks
Area clear, access good, enough space for install
Duct route clear, Penetrations complete
Nogs/Supports in place
First Fix
Access Panel requirements marked up on drawings and submitted to client
All works from builders or other trades to enable Mechanical First fix to be completed (e.g.. drains, framing, penetrations&)
All flexible ducts cable tied and taped to duct
Identify locations and correct model of Fire damper to be installed
Install to Manufacturers Specifications
Inform RHC PM Fire Dampers are ready for sealing
Using damper handle and fusible link, test damper operation and then set blade to required postition
Understand the requirements of the Seismic PS1 and identify the locations where engineered bracing is required
Install using Materials specified in the PS1
Upload Photos of Install
Refer back to Seismic Engineer for PS4 Production.
Mechanical First Fix complete
Second Fix
All works from builders or other trades to enable Mechanical second fix to be completed (e.g.. painting, waterproofing...)
Mechanical Second Fix complete
Commissioning
Mechanical Plant commissioned
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
S - S - Ventilation - Apartment Ventilation
Pre-start checks
Penetrations done in floors and walls (if needed)
Space for ducting (no trades in the way)
Pipe through exterior wall installed by RHC to connect to
Drawings and work scope confirmed
First Fix
Ductwork run straight level and well supported
All ductwork joints sealed
All SAB joints sealed and taped
All flexible ducts cable tied and taped to duct
Identify locations and correct model of Fire damper to be installed
Inform RHC PM Fire Dampers are ready for sealing
Using damper handle and fusible link, test damper operation and then set blade to required postition
Understand the requirements of the Seismic PS1 and identify the locations where engineered bracing is required
Install using Materials specified in the PS1
Upload Photos of Install
All seismic restraints in place (if needed)
Flexible ducts fixed in place to grille location
Identify Fan Upgrade Requirement
Area Clear for Install of Ducting, Fan, and Control Box
Install Fan, ducting and control box as per spec.
Grille locations/access panels marked on plans
Mechanical First Fix complete
Second Fix
Ceiling fans installed square and level
Kitchen range hood installed by RHC to connect to
Fingerprints removed from grilles/walls/ceilings
Fan plugged in before install to ceiling
External louver supplied by TSL, installed by RHC completed
Commissioning form completed & given to TSL
Mechanical Second Fix complete
Commissioning
Correct product used as per requirements
Correct design followed as per drawings
Mechanical Plant commissioned
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
